CorePluginsAdmin.AlwaysActivatedPluginsList: The following plugins are always activated and cannot be disabled: %s
CorePluginsAdmin.ChangeSettingsPossible: You can change %1$ssettings%2$s for this plugin.
CorePluginsAdmin.CorePluginTooltip: Core plugins have no version since they are distributed with Matomo.
CorePluginsAdmin.DoMoreContactPiwikAdmins: To install a new plugin or a new theme, please get in touch with your Matomo admins.
CorePluginsAdmin.ChangeLookByManageThemes: You can change the appearance of Matomo by %1$sManaging Themes%2$s.
CorePluginsAdmin.InfoPluginUpdateIsRecommended: Update your plugins now to benefit from the latest improvements.
CorePluginsAdmin.InfoThemeIsUsedByOtherUsersAsWell: Note: the other %1$s users registered in this Matomo are also using the theme %2$s.
CorePluginsAdmin.InfoThemeUpdateIsRecommended: Update your themes to enjoy the latest version.
CorePluginsAdmin.CommunityContributedPlugin: This is a community contributed plugin, brought to you for free.
CorePluginsAdmin.ConsiderDonatingCreatorOf: Please consider donating to the creator of %s
CorePluginsAdmin.PluginsExtendPiwik: Plugins extend and expand the functionality of Matomo.
CorePluginsAdmin.OncePluginIsInstalledYouMayActivateHere: Once a plugin is installed, you may activate it or deactivate it here.
CorePluginsAdmin.MissingRequirementsNotice: Please update %1$s %2$s to a newer version, %1$s %3$s is required.
CorePluginsAdmin.MissingRequirementsPleaseInstallNotice: Please install %1$s %2$s as it is required by %3$s.
CorePluginsAdmin.NoPluginSettings: No plugin settings that can be configured
CorePluginsAdmin.PluginNotFoundAlternative: If you've been using this plugin, try reuploading or reinstalling it from the marketplace. If not, click uninstall to remove it from the list.
CorePluginsAdmin.PluginNotWorkingAlternative: If you've been using this plugin, maybe you can find a more recent version in the Marketplace. If not, you may want to uninstall it.
CorePluginsAdmin.PluginNotDownloadablePaidReason: Possible reasons are an expired or exceeded license.
CorePluginsAdmin.PluginRequiresInternet: This plugin requires a working internet connection. Please check your config value for `enable_internet_features` if you want to use this feature.
CorePluginsAdmin.TeaserExtendPiwik: Extend Matomo with Plugins and Themes
CorePluginsAdmin.TeaserExtendPiwikByPlugin: Extend Matomo by %1$sinstalling plugins from the Marketplace%2$s or %3$supload a plugin in .zip format%4$s.
CorePluginsAdmin.TeaserExtendPiwikByTheme: Enjoy another look & feel by %1$sinstalling a new theme%2$s.
CorePluginsAdmin.InstallingNewPluginViaMarketplaceOrUploa: You may automatically install plugins from the Marketplace or %1$supload a plugin%2$s in .zip format.
CorePluginsAdmin.ThemesDescription: Themes can change the appearance of Matomo user interface, and provide a completely new visual experience to enjoy your analytics reports.
CorePluginsAdmin.UninstallConfirm: You are about to uninstall a plugin %s. The plugin will be completely removed from your platform and it won't be recoverable. Are you sure you want to do this?
CorePluginsAdmin.WeCouldNotLoadThePluginAsItHasMissingDep: The plugin %1$s could not be loaded as it has missing dependencies: %2$s
